item.title: How to make a blog in R blogdown and Github Pages
item.description: This is a quick tutorial on how to create a blog with R and deploy it in Github Pages. I assume that R and Rstudio are already installed on your PC. If not, here is a link on how to set up the environment. All steps below are done in Rstudio. Step 1. Install blogdown and hugo themes. At first, letâ€™s run these two commands in R console and install blogdown and hugo.
